basics.summary: Experiences collecting and analyzing data with statistical methods, familiar with R and SAS programing, great knowledge of experiment design, sampling techniques and documents management. Strong skills in communication, group-working and work-planning.

projects.name: The Relationship between the Mathematical Grade of the Seventh Grade and Grades from Primary School
projects.description: Use of linear model to fit transformed variables from the data after getting rid of useless columns, choose the most significant variables to form the final model based on persuasive diagnostic values. Findings showed the mathematical grade of the seventh grade is significantly influenced by the reading, counting and logistic ability at the first and second grade in the primary school.

projects.name: Bike Rental Prediction
projects.description: Regression model construction using different statistical method, finding the most powerful model decided by finding the least error rate, and deciding which variables significantly enough to build the model. Lasso was used to make the regression, it gives the least error rate and use the almost original data set, it saves a lot of time to deal with the original data set.

projects.name: Classify Song Release Period
projects.description: Classification model construction to classify a specific song into the year before or after the year 1986 based on 90 attributes of a single song and 6480 songs. Multivariate adaptive regression splines was used to build the model and based on the final classification model, if the song is from before or after on 1986 depends mostly on the artists who create them, secondary on properties they tagged by famous music website and finally on properties of their track.

projects.name: Predict the Lightening Strikes in July
projects.description: Initial clustering of data based on lightening strike records and the moisture records with the method of K-mean and Hierarchical method. Using different statistical method to find the best model to predict the strikes will happen. Based on the moisture data to form the cluster and use the neural network is a better way for prediction to get a smaller MSE, and lightning strike have direct relationship with the soil moisture level and the climate indices.

projects.name: Predict the Daily Stock Price of Netflix Inc.
projects.description: Use of GARCH model to fit the transformed data and finally choose the GARCH plus ARMAR model to make the forecasting. The model shows an uptrend in the future about this stock and this is an appropriate time to buy this piece of stock.
